# Project Plan

## Title
<!-- Give your project a short title. -->
Food Habit Analysis of North Americans

## Main Question

<!-- Think about one main question you want to answer based on the data. -->
1. Is there is any pattern in food habit in different region of North American?

## Description

<!-- Describe your data science project in max. 200 words. Consider writing about why and how you attempt it. -->
Explore the "1500 North American Restaurants Dataset," a comprehensive collection spanning diverse cuisines and dining experiences across the continent. With details like cuisine types, service options and ratings, it's ideal for data visualizations, sentiment analysis and predictive models. Uncover food habit of different parts of North American People.

## Datasources

<!-- Describe each datasources you plan to use in a section. Use the prefic "DatasourceX" where X is the id of the datasource. -->

### Datasource1: 
* Metadata URL: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/saketk511/1500-north-american-resturants
* Data URL: https://storage.googleapis.com/kaggle-data-sets/4435273/7615817/bundle/archive.zip?X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=gcp-kaggle-com%40kaggle-161607.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20241105%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20241105T165908Z&X-Goog-Expires=259200&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=host&X-Goog-
* Data Type: CSV

This dataset is taken from Kaggle.
